Ingredients.2: 5 pounds lean beef short ribs, cut into 3-inch pieces

Ingredients.5: 1 large onion, cut into thick slices and separated into rings

Ingredients.6: 5  carrots, peeled and cut into chunks

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Directions.2: Heat oil over medium heat in a large, heavy, oven-safe pot or Dutch oven, and brown the ribs on all sides, about 5 minutes, working in batches if necessary. Sprinkle ribs with salt and black pepper as they brown. Transfer cooked ribs to paper towels to blot up extra oil.

Directions.3: Stir the onion rings and carrots into the same pot, and cook and stir until the onions turn translucent and start to brown, about 8 minutes. Stir in the garlic, and cook until fragrant, about 1 more minute. Mix in tomato sauce, barbeque sauce, and beef broth; bring the sauce to a boil, and simmer for 1 minute to blend flavors. Stir in the browned ribs.

Directions.4: Cover the pot, and bake in the preheated oven until the rib meat is very tender, about 2 1/2 hours. Turn the ribs occasionally while cooking. Season to taste with salt and black pepper before serving hot.
